name: Troy Pelayo Galido
feedback: The perfume is okay for me because it smells good and it takes a long time before the scent fades from the body.

name: Kim Ashley Pineda
feedback: Since some people are sensitive to strong scents and sometimes feel dizzy, your product is just right the combination of perfumes is well balanced. It’s highly recommended for students and other buyers. Overall, everything’s great.

name: Nash Alipio
feedback: It smells great and lasts a really long time. It's nice to use daily. I give it 5 stars because it's worth the price and lasted for 3 months.

name: Anikin Luke Abales
feedback: It has a fresh, long-lasting fragrance that sticks to the skin and leaves it feeling soft.

name: Steve Bilog
feedback: I tried one of their products, it is good, how the silage of the perfume ive tried lasts is good as expensive ones.
